# === Secrets ===
# AI-irrelevant secret/credential files (sensitive + no code value)
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Environment files
.env
.env.*
!.env.example
!.env.template

# Certificates & keys
*.pem
*.key
*.cert
*.crt
*.p12
*.pfx
*.jks

# Credential files
credentials.json
service-account.json
service-account-key.json
gcloud-service-key.json

# Auth tokens
.npmrc
.pypirc
.gem/credentials
.docker/config.json

# SSH keys
id_rsa
id_ed25519
*.pub

# AWS
.aws/credentials
.aws/config

# Terraform state (contains secrets)
*.tfstate
*.tfstate.*
